entities.name: arry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is carrying a secret inside his chest.

entities.name: um bridge
entities.description: A teacher at the school where arry attends, described as having horrible bulging eyes.

entities.name: da
entities.description: The District Attorney, who is resisting Um Bridge's efforts.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: A government organization that is feared by the D.A. and Um Bridge.

entities.name: wilbert slinkhard
entities.description: The author of a book that arry is supposed to read during Um Bridge's lessons.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A character who successfully disarmed Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A character who was disarmed by Neville.

entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: A character who mastered the Impediment Jinx after three meetings' hard effort.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: A character who produced a good Reductor Curse that reduced a table to dust.

entities.name: sneakoscopes
entities.description: Devices used by the characters in their magic lessons.

relationships.description: Arry and the D.A. are resisting Um Bridge's efforts.
Colin Creevey mastered the Impediment Jinx after three meetings' hard effort.
Parvati Patil produced a good Reductor Curse that reduced a table to dust.
